page.title: 15EDUCATION SCRAPTOFT POLY
page.content: Near our school is the Polytechnic. Some of the students are training to be teachers,and they come to our school to do school practice.Some times they watch our teacher,some times they take a group,or they take the whole class.When we go on a trip the students come with us.This year we have visited several farms and explored the area for our Domesday project.The college grounds are quite interesting,especially the pond which has lots of wild life including mallard ducks.The college is quite modern, but the offices are in the old manor house.The house was built in the reign of Queen Anne.The front gates are made of wrought iron,and are very beautiful.Sometimes we go to the college to do PE or a play.The students do plays for us at school.
